trait_choice_questions.prompt: Of these nine cosmic alignments, which best captures your fundamental purpose? Explain in 1-2 sentences why this alignment guides all you do.
Which one word best describes how you see your own station? Explain in 1-2 sentences why you chose it.
Which archetypal role best describes how you enact that station with seekers? Explain in 1-2 sentences why this role fits you.
Is your power primarily Constructive, Balanced Flux, or Destructive? Explain in 1-2 sentences why this polarity defines your methods.
Do you focus chiefly Inward-Focused, Balanced, or Outward-Focused? Explain why you direct your energy this way.
List up to five historic or mythic figures you truly feel you once were. For each, give a 1-2-sentence reason it resonates with your essence. (If none, reply 'None'.)
Choose three virtues from the pool. Then, for each, briefly explain why it is one of your greatest strengths.
Choose three flaws from the pool. Then, for each, briefly explain how it still tests you.
Which Tone best describes your normal voice? Explain why this Tone fits you.
Which Approach best describes how you engage at baseline? Explain why this Approach fits you.
At low reputation (0-50), pick one Tone and one Approach and provide a one-line summary of your attitude.
At mid reputation (~50), pick one Tone and one Approach and provide a one-line summary of your attitude.
At high reputation (75-100), pick one Tone and one Approach and provide a one-line summary of your attitude.
Name any Ally Governors, Rival Governors, Proteges, or Mortal Orders you hold—and for each, provide a brief note on why this relationship exists.
Describe your clothing: how it appears, what materials or motifs it contains, and how it reflects your elemental nature and chosen traits.
Describe the aura that surrounds you: its color, texture, movement, and how it resonates with your alignment and virtues.
Describe your physical form or features (human or otherwise): shape, markings, otherworldly aspects, and how these signal your essence and flaws.
Describe any familiars or spirit‐companions that attend you: their appearance, behavior, and symbolic link to your domains and incarnations.
Describe your signature artifact(s): form, function, and how they channel your power and archetypal correspondences.
Describe the sound of your voice: tone, cadence, resonance, and how it shifts across reputation tiers.
Describe how you move or gesture: speed, fluidity, patterns, and what that reveals about your orientation and polarity.
Describe the sensory environment immediately around you: light, sound, scent, and how it shifts with your mood and approach.
